title: Flash trip to the beach
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Home movies and video
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
abstract: Two boys and a motorbike head to the beach.
description: This home movie takes us back to an era when holidays seemed longer, days sunnier and road safety was much less of an issue. Older Bayside residents will be interested in scenes taken of Brighton streets and the Kinane Street beach. A man and a boy take a trip to the beach on the back of a motorbike.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006573; Selection of titles from the Inala Straford Home Movie Archive Collection; Active; 2004
